subject: Horse Racing
Big Brown (Race Horse)
Curlin (Race Horse)
lead_paragraph: The Kentucky Derby and Preakness winner injured his right front hoof during a workout Monday and was immediately retired, thwarting an anticipated showdown with Curlin in the Breeders’ Cup Classic.
snippet: The Kentucky Derby and Preakness winner injured his right front hoof during a workout Monday and was immediately retired, thwarting an anticipated showdown with Curlin in the Breeders’ Cup Classic.
